description: I have a headache and fever for 2 days

report_data.symptoms_summary: You have been experiencing a headache and a fever for the past two days. These symptoms often occur together when your body is fighting off an illness.
possible_conditions: Viral Infection (like a cold or the flu)
recommendations: Get plenty of rest to help your body recover.
Drink lots of fluids like water, broth, or herbal tea to stay hydrated.
Consider over-the-counter fever reducers and pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen, as directed.
Place a cool, damp cloth on your forehead to help ease your headache and fever.
report_data.when_to_see_doctor: See a doctor if your fever goes above 103°F (39.4°C), your headache becomes severe and unbearable, you develop a stiff neck or rash, or if your symptoms don't start to improve in the next 2-3 days.
report_data.disclaimer: This is not a medical diagnosis. Please consult a doctor for proper evaluation.
